title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to encourage the development and deployment of innovative and efficient energy technologies.
content: Combined Heat and Power Advancement Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal Power Act to prescribe procedural guidelines for: (1) the interconnection of a generating facility with the distribution facilities of the local distribution utility. (2) the interconnection of a generating facility with the transmission facilities of a transmitting utility. And (3) offers to sell backup power by a local distribution utility and by a transmitting utility to an interconnected generating facility.
